enchantment.mujmajnkraftsbettersurvival.arrowrecovery.desc=This enchantment can be applied on bow and will gie you chance to gain your arrow back if you hit any entity.
enchantment.mujmajnkraftsbettersurvival.agility.desc=This enchantment can be applied on leggings and will increase your movement speed.
enchantment.mujmajnkraftsbettersurvival.blast.desc=This enchantment will make arrows explode.
enchantment.mujmajnkraftsbettersurvival.blockpower.desc=This enchatnment will allow shields to block more damage.
enchantment.mujmajnkraftsbettersurvival.diamonds.desc=This enchantment can be applied on pickaxe and will give you chance to get diamonds from any ore, that does not drop itself.
enchantment.mujmajnkraftsbettersurvival.education.desc=This enchantment can be applied on melee weapon and will increase amount of experience you get from killed enemies.
enchantment.mujmajnkraftsbettersurvival.fling.desc=This enchantment can be applied on melee weapon and will throw any enemy you hit into air.
enchantment.mujmajnkraftsbettersurvival.highjump.desc=This enchantment can be applied on boots and will increase jump height.
enchantment.mujmajnkraftsbettersurvival.multishot.desc=This enchantment can be applied on bow and allow you to shoot multiple arrows at once.
enchantment.mujmajnkraftsbettersurvival.range.desc=This enchantment can be applied on bow and will make your arrows fly further.
enchantment.mujmajnkraftsbettersurvival.penetration.desc=This enchantment can be applied on melee weapon to reduce enemy armor upon hit.
enchantment.mujmajnkraftsbettersurvival.rapidfire.desc=This enchantment can be applied on bow and will increase drawing speed.
enchantment.mujmajnkraftsbettersurvival.reflection.desc=This enchantment can be applied on shield and will damage any enemy who hits you while blocking.
enchantment.mujmajnkraftsbettersurvival.smelting.desc=This enchantment can be applied on tools and will smelt the mined block.
enchantment.mujmajnkraftsbettersurvival.tunneling.desc=This enchantment can be applied on tools and will make them mine additional blocks next to ** you mined, if they can aslo be mined by that tool.
enchantment.mujmajnkraftsbettersurvival.spellshield.desc=This enchantment will allow shields to block magic damage as well.
enchantment.mujmajnkraftsbettersurvival.vampirism.desc=This enchantment can be applied on melee weapon and will sometimie heal you upon hitting any entity.
enchantment.mujmajnkraftsbettersurvival.versatility.desc=This enchantment can be applied on tools and will increase mining speed against blocks this tool is not supposed to mine (like against wood with pickaxe).
enchantment.mujmajnkraftsbettersurvival.vitality.desc=This enchantment can be applied on chestplate and will increase natural regeneration rate.
enchantment.mujmajnkraftsbettersurvival.weightless.desc=This enchantment can be applied on shield and it will no longer slow you down while blocking.
